content: silas sprout materials 5mm hook 3 5mm hook for hair & scarf worsted weight yarn pale green darker green brown & small amounts of black & red black safety eyes 30mm or you can crochet rounds with black included at end of the pattern scissors stitch marker yarn needle stuffing worked in the round with the exception of the hair & scarf silas is my own creation i have double checked the pattern but typo s can slip by please feel free to message me with any questions the finished doll stands about 10 inches
